name: Rajesh Kumar
bio: With over 10 years of experience, Rajesh specializes in functional training and strength conditioning.

name: Priya Sharma
bio: Priya brings 8 years of yoga expertise, focusing on Hatha, Vinyasa, and restorative practices.

name: Vikram Menon
bio: Vikram helps clients achieve their specific goals through personalized training and nutrition plans.

name: Anjali Nair
bio: Anjali creates high-energy group classes that make fitness fun and accessible for everyone.
